content:
57 
 
COURSE/  
DEGREE AWARDING  
INSTITUTIONS  
 REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY   UTME  
     (xix) OAU accepts   
a) ND upper credit in Accounting, also 
ICAN/ACCA examination at professional 
level or ATS (Stage III) examination of  
ICAN  
b) Advanced Level passes in Economics,  
Accounting, Business Management, plus 
Government  and  Geography  or  
ICAN/ATS I, II and III.  
(xx) PLASU accepts  
a) degree in any programme provided the 
candidate  meets  the  'O' 
 level  
requirements   
b) HND  lower  credit  in 
 relevant programmes with 'O' level 
requirements.  
c) ND lower credit in relevant programmes 
with 'O' level requirements.   
d) IJMB minimum of 7 points with passes in 
relevant subjects, with 'O' level 
requirement.   
e) PLASU does not accept University 
Diplomas and other Diplomas not 
accredited by the relevant accrediting 
bodies.  
(xxi) RSUST accepts the following qualifications for 
200 Level:  a) ND upper credit in relevant 
programme or a Degree/HND not relevant to 
the programme for admissions to 200 Level; 
b) A Degree/HND relevant to the programme 
for admissions to 300 Level.  
(xxii) UDU accepts   
a) ‘O’ level credit in Accounts In lieu of  
Economics
